results.name: Danganronpa (Live Action) Collection
results.overview: Live action films based on the game series of the same name.

results.name: Missing in Action Collection
results.overview: Missing in Action Trilogy starring Chuck Norris.

results.name: Bandit (Action Pack) Collection
results.overview: Following an abortive one-season attempt by Universal Television to offer a three-series Hollywood Premiere Network in 1990-91, in 1994, the Action Pack initially ran a series of television movies, which led to the run of several television shows the following year.

results.name: Aladdin (Live-Action) Collection
results.overview: The adventures of Aladdin, Jasmine and their friend - the Genie.

results.name: Pettson and Findus (Live Action Collection)
results.overview: Live action films based on Swedish author Sven Nordqvist's children's books.

results.name: 101 Dalmatians (Live-Action) Collection
results.overview: A live-action remake film series of the 1961 Disney animated film 101 Dalmatians

results.name: G.I. Joe (Live-Action) Collection
results.overview: A science fiction action film series based on the G.I. Joe toy franchise, with inspiration from the comic book and cartoon series.

results.name: Shrill Cries Collection
results.original_name: Higurashi no naku koro ni (Live Action) Collection
results.overview: The story of a group of young friends and the mysterious events that occur in the rural village of Hinamizawa.

results.name: Shameless School (Live Action) Collection
results.overview: Comedy of high school where students and teachers run wild, based on a popular comic strip.

results.name: Barefoot Gen (Live-Action) Collection
results.original_name: はだしのゲン（実写映画）

results.name: Rurouni Kenshin (Live-Action) Collection
results.original_name: るろうに剣心 (実写) シリーズ
results.overview: Collection of the live-action adaptation of the Rurouni Kenshin comic series.

results.name: Fullmetal Alchemist (Live-Action) Collection
results.original_name: 鋼の錬金術師コレクション
results.overview: A series of films based on the manga of the same name.

results.name: The Flintstones Collection
results.overview: The two live-action films are featured in The Flintstones Yabba Dabba Two-Pack! It's the Hanna-Barbera classic like you've never seen it before, as director Brian Levant and his creative team capture all the wacky gadgets, colorful creatures and clever visual gags of Bedrock with wild imagination. A rock-solid cast, including John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell and Academy Award winners Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor, breathe comic life into Fred Flintstone and his friends' hilarious attempts to make it in a barely civilized world.

results.name: Scooby-Doo Collection
results.overview: Live action films based on the animated characters of the same name.

results.name: Garfield Collection
results.overview: Garfield: The Movie, or simply Garfield, is a 2004 American family comedy film directed by Peter Hewitt and inspired by Jim Davis' comic strip of the same name. It stars Breckin Meyer as Jon Arbuckle, Jennifer Love Hewitt as Dr. Liz Wilson, and features Bill Murray as the voice of Garfield. Garfield the cat was created with computer animation, though all other animals were real. A sequel Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties was released 2006.
